template.description: TML template with html markup and Tapestry components completion
template.name: New Tapestry TML File

templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?> <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:t="http://tapestry.apache.org/schema/tapestry_5_1_0.xsd" xmlns:p="tapestry:parameter">
<!-- Most of the page content, including <head>, <body>, etc. tags, comes from Layout.tml -->
</html>
